Show / Hide Table of Contents

Class TestConfiguration

An object of this class holds a queue of Instructions to run and a Parameter control template to use for observing values during a test-run. An instance of this class can also be saved and/or loaded from a LiteDatabase collection

RunQueuedInstruction(DataStream)

Run the next instruction in the queue if the queue is not empty. Also invokes the callback functions at the right time, if they are set
